issue.title: qds.it
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://qds.it/video-gorilla-infuriato-guardiani-paura-zoo/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fqds.it%2Fvideo-gorilla-infuriato-guardiani-paura-zoo%2F) ### Comment > - empty space at the top > - subscription widgets on the homepage ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ql154tfhbusgkccck4ocok8ggkwks8wig423ib8d7w.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/m2a8pu77q34cc8gkgwwgkk0wckw8cgsgpudx9mdw20.png?nc=1)

comment.body:
For the empty space:
```
qds.it###wrap > div[style="min-height:110px"]
qds.it#$##wrap { margin-top: 0px !important; }
```

Widgets:
```
qds.it##.pc-sezione-home-flusso a[href^="https://whatsapp.com/channel/"]
qds.it##.pc-sezione-home-flusso a[href^="https://qds.it/newsletter"]
qds.it##.pc-sezione-home-flusso a[href="https://qds.it/category/scrivere-lenergia/"]

```

Then, no video on my end.
Ok adding
```
@@||qds.it/wp-content/plugins/digistream/digiplayer/js/videojs.ga.js$script,first-party
||imasdk.googleapis.com/js/sdkloader/ima3.js$script,redirect=google-ima3,domain=qds.it,important
```

issue.title: www.oth-regensburg.de
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.oth-regensburg.de/studieren/international/studium-in-regensburg/internationale-studierende/vor-dem-studium](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.oth-regensburg.de%2Fstudieren%2Finternational%2Fstudium-in-regensburg%2Finternationale-studierende%2Fvor-dem-studium) ### Comment > If adguard is on, this website is unusable, only mouse-scroll works, when I click, does not react. When I disable adguard and make CTRL+F5 or refresh some times the page, I see cookies notification, I choose min. necessary cookie options and then the site works and reacts on my clicks. I did not use user rules here and there are no filter-updates available in this time. Operas blocker was always on, antivirus is not checking my browser and we can ignore that. When I turn adguard on, all works. Check and fix please, I need this website and want always let Adguard on. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/o1p5qvtbou80wk0ko0ggkwo0wk04408eammn92aajc.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/bii1yntc5h4wwok8o4k0o8owo8c80gcndrexmtgj0g.png?nc=1)
